title: Keyline
creator_credit: Perier Films and Rural Bank of New South Wales
brief_description: Describes the “keyline” method of conserving soil and building up its fertility. Stresses the need for soil and water conservation and proper use of soil in Australia. Illustrates, by means of diagrams, the position of a keyline on a property and demonstrates methods by which it can be selected and marked. Shows the best site for the construction of a keyline dam.
